Kapsiki_DC: Katezeme wəshi kezeme yɛ behe behe, katetsahe sləa ɗa yɛ, 'ya Shala Mahwətə ta ŋayɛ nya kemene ŋayɛ wəshi meŋele. Katezhɛne hawe kadzete mbelia ɗa tɛape we.
Tupurri: Nday ree ge yañ go ti koñne äay day nday togoë ge ndi Manwuri, Baa äayn yañ. Nday jar mani äin nday joñ ge nen soçoçre gaa so has wer feçeçre äuëgi maga ndi joñ ge ra see äay mono.

Francais: Et vous saurez que je suis au milieu d'Israël ! Moi, je suis Yahweh, votre Dieu, et il n'y en a point d'autre, et mon peuple ne sera plus jamais confus !
Anglais: And ye shall know that I am in the midst of Israel, and that I am the  Lord  your God, and none else: and my people shall never be ashamed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nigi ma wi ala nan ka jar sa Israyella, nanu mi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiya, Lawn mara ma ŋiray hiɗi nan mayɗi, Sumuna vanu ma lak hay zulot loɗi. Ŋusta Peldetta ma ɓuraw goy kay sumuna
Bulu: Eyoñe te mia ye yeme na me ne zañe jenan éyoñ ése a bone bʼIsraél, na ma me ne Nti, e Zambe wônan, teke môte mfe! Teke foʼo bebé, ayoñe bôte dam da ye bo te beta bili ôson.
Guiziga: Ki sa sinaka na, ya, y'ada a wuzla Israyel, mizli ɗuwoyo, yo yi Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ kum, mekelem anta. mizli ɗuwoy anta pam mesem mata ndiɗaˀ wãˀ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden kam on anndan min mi ɗon caka Isra'iila, min mi Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon, walaa goɗɗo feere. Ummaatoore am meetataa semtineego!”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden kam on anndan min mi ɗon caka Isra'iila, min mi Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon, walaa goɗɗo feere. Ummaatoore am meetataa semtineego!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ nde, mi a̧a̧ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́, o be  Israɛl . GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mi nɛ zu'm, ŋma bo na. Hegɔ foe beka de dukbíí kɔ‘m woyo ɓɔna.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ nde, mi a̧a̧ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́, o be  Israɛl . GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mi nɛ zu'm, ŋma bo na. Hegɔ foe beka de dukbíí kɔ‘m woyo ɓɔna.»
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, kateɗepete yɛ 'ya ya hwa gheyɛ, gheyɛ ka Israyɛl, 'ya ya kaMahwətə Shala ta ŋayɛ, kwete Shala shɛ we. Katezhɛne hawe kadzete mbelia ɗa tɛape we.»
Tupurri: Ti wur sen ni, nday jar Israyel, jar ma ni äin, Nday ko ge yañ ga ndi Manwuri, Baa äayn ti holañ äay. Nday ko ge yañ lay ga Baa ma tigriñ bay do ndi no wa so. Day nday jar mani äin nday joñ ge nen soçoçre gaa so has lay.

Francais: Et il arrivera après cela que je répandrai mon Esprit sur toute chair. Et vos fils et vos filles prophétiseront, vos vieillards auront des songes, vos jeunes gens verront des visions.
Anglais: For, behold, in those days, and in that time, when I shall bring again the captivity of Judah and Jerusalem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni nan ma was ŋusta vanu goy kay sumun kafe. Joriyona hiɗi guro-boyna vigiya, ma di kay slen ma voksina. Sa maariyana vigiya duwayt ma disiya, sa gurayna vigiya slen ma vul tuwam kirsiya.
Bulu: Eyoñe mam mete me maneya, ma ye sôé Nsisime wom e be môta binam ase. Bobefame benan a bobebinga benan ba ye kulu mejô. Minnôm mi bôte mienan mia ye yeme biyeyem a bendômane ki ba ye yene mam.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ɓi: «A dirba nah na, i sa po ˀUf ɗu ar mbur titira gar. Ziri kum mizilehey ati mongosohoy, a sa ɓam ɓi ngi gwat masa gi tumbuŋ, midigila kumoy a sa musuwunam, yo gawla ati diili kumoy a sa puram ti kleŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Ɓaawo man mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow yimɓe fuu: Ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe e rewɓe mbaɗan annabaaku, ndotti'en mooɗon koyɗan koyɗi, suka'en mooɗon keɓan wahayuuji.
Fulfulde_DC: “Ɓaawo man mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow yimɓe fuu: Ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe e rewɓe mbaɗan annabaaku, ndotti'en mooɗon koyɗan koyɗi, suka'en mooɗon keɓan wahayuuji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ siti: «Mi tɛ ha̧  Ɔmi  kɔ‘m ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ; o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-a tɛ tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧; o gbɛ́rɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ zu, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ hɔ zu ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ siti: «Mi tɛ ha̧  Ɔmi  kɔ‘m ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ; o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-a tɛ tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧; o gbɛ́rɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ zu, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ hɔ zu ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Shala gezete: «Ma kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ ne, kateve nda Sefəa ɗa 'ya ke mbeli pɛtɛ. Katenza ŋwale tezhilia ŋayɛ ba'a ŋwalea kwɛa ŋayɛ kaka mɛ ŋkwa, kateshiwə ka meha mehɛɗia ŋayɛ ba'a katenewe wəshi ka mempɛhwetɛtia ŋayɛ laka kelɛŋə.
Tupurri: Blam sen mokay no, ndi cwaa ge Nenterse äin yañ ne wosela äuy ti. Weere äay wo de mayre äay ndar ge wo nen waçaçre Baa yañ go. Jar kluuri äay lwaë ge wo yañ, Ndi ndar ge nen feçeçre wo yañ ne weere joçoçre äayn wo lay.

Francais: Même sur les serviteurs et sur les servantes, en ces jours-là je répandrai mon esprit.
Anglais: I will also gather all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat, and will plead with them there for my people and for my heritage Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations, and parted my land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa gorvona van ɦawa kaw, nan min was ŋusta van goy tisiya, sa jufayna hiɗi sa boyn kaw.
Bulu: Toʼo na e be bebo bisaé befam a binga ma ye sôé Nsisime wom melu mete.
Guiziga: ko ar gawla ɗu mizile ati mongosohoy kwana, tapasa, i sa po ˀUf ɗu angi taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo dow maccuɓe e horɓe, mi waanjan Ruuhu am nder saa'i man.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo dow maccuɓe e horɓe, mi waanjan Ruuhu am nder saa'i man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, kóó nɛ wi-de-tom, kóó nɛ kó-de-tom, mi tɛ ha̧  Ɔmi  kɔ‘m ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, kóó nɛ wi-de-tom, kóó nɛ kó-de-tom, mi tɛ ha̧  Ɔmi  kɔ‘m ha̧ a̧.

Tupurri: Ti wur sen ni, ndi cwaa ge Nenterse äin ne gebere wo dra' ti lay, Ma twerpiiri wo de ma tenaare äaaran wo äuy.

Francais: Je ferai paraître des prodiges dans les cieux et sur la terre, du sang, du feu et des colonnes de fumée.
Anglais: And they have cast lots for my people; and have given a boy for an harlot, and sold a girl for wine, that they might drink.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan ma li ɗekka kulo hay dukalawna, gaa kay nagat kaw, nigi ma wi busuwna; kuta, hiɗi nuk ma pat kamu.
Bulu: Ma ye liti bitua bi mam e yôp a si: metyi, nduan a ôtita minkut.
Guiziga: I sa gi gwat migam ɗaˀ tahay a muŋ waɗ a ruwuyo, pumbus, vu waɗ musure ngi cunju.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi waɗan kaayeefiiji haa asama e dow lesdi: Ƴiiƴam e yiite e daŋraŋge cuurɗe mbaŋgan!
Fulfulde_DC: Mi waɗan kaayeefiiji haa asama e dow lesdi: Ƴiiƴam e yiite e daŋraŋge cuurɗe mbaŋgan!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mi tɛ de mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn yiwese in sɛn zu nu; bíí tɛ zɔk tɔk in wee ká bá nɛ̀ tura zi-wee.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mi tɛ de mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn yiwese in sɛn zu nu; bíí tɛ zɔk tɔk in wee ká bá nɛ̀ tura zi-wee.
Kapsiki_DC: Katemene wəshi meŋele 'ya pelɛ ghweme ba'a kwake te hɛɗi, mimi, ghwə ba'a geɗeɗe ta n'yi.
Tupurri: Ndi joñ ge feçeçre mbuëgi wo yañ nen ngeel ma ciñ lay ti tamsir lay. Nday ko ge wuu wo de ci yañ de nen äay, cug ndar ge yañ ciñ debañ lay.

Francais: Le soleil se changera en ténèbres, et la lune en sang, avant que vienne le jour de Yahweh, grand et terrible.
Anglais: Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O Tyre, and Zidon, and all the coasts of Philistia? will ye render me a recompence? and if ye recompense me, swiftly and speedily will I return your recompence upon your own head;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Fatta ma muɗ goy jufunu, tilla ma muɗ goy busuwu, kayni ma li'e jew mata vi Ma-Vatɗina. Fatta ŋolda ta ɦuyum kuɗa'ta.
Bulu: Jôp da ye bo ékukut ngone ki évele ane metyi, te na môse Nti ô so, beta a ékowoñe môs ôte.
Guiziga: Ti hin ngi Bumbulvuŋ, hin mimadiɗa magi zluwun haɗa na, pas a sa mbiɗi a go luvuŋ, yo kiya a sa tiri gagazakaɓa pumbusu.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru boo woojan bana ƴiiƴam. Nden nyalaade am mawnde hulniinde waran !”
Fulfulde_DC: Naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru boo woojan bana ƴiiƴam. Nden nyalaade am mawnde hulniinde waran !”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wese tɛ ba tum, ɓɛɛ nyaŋa-zɛ tɛ gbɛ̧ zóŋ-zóŋ hee tɔk ga nɛti sɛka wese ko GASA WAN hɔa. Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ gasa wese in wese-ŋgamɔ.»

Tupurri: Suñgu äo' ge yañ go ne wur nene, few kol ge yañ go de seçeç do ci no lay. Sen mo äuy go tañgu maga wur ma kluu mani Manwurn a ge mono.

Francais: Et quiconque invoquera le nom de Yahweh sera sauvé ; car sur la montagne de Sion et de Jérusalem, il y aura une réunion de sauvés, comme l'a dit Yahweh, et parmi les survivants que Yahweh appelle !
Anglais: Because ye have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried into your temples my goodly pleasant things:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buur namna ɗawni, sa ma yi sem Ma-Vatɗinawana, nam ma fi su'da. Su'da ma co'o kay hiɗiyta vi Siyon, hay Yerusalem kaw. Ki Ma-Vatɗin di nala, sa hin kuɗsina Ma-Vatɗin min vulsi yita.
Bulu: A ye bo na môt ase a ye sili mvolane be Nti a ye nyiiban. E Yérusalém, e nkôle siône yôp, bôte bʼéziñ ba ye fame bidim bia ye kui avale Nti a nga ve ngakaʼa. Balé bete ba ye bo ba a loone na be nyiñ.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, ko waka gar mizila slimiɗ ngi Bumbulvuŋ le na, a sa lihi. Asi mike na, mizli ada masa ndiram ti siifa a muwã Siyoŋ waɗ a Zeruzaleme, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa zleˀe, i mizli naŋ Bumbulvuŋ masa zila taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa koo moy ewnotooɗo innde Jawmiraawo, hisan. Ngam hisanɓe ngonan dow hooseere Siyona, nder berniwol Urusaliima, bana no Jawmiraawo wi'i. Mo Jawmiraawo ewni ɗum, yeeɗan .
